root.name: Famicom Meijin Sen
root.description: OverviewFamicom Meijin Sen ("Meijin Sen" being a pro tournament for Shogi) is a Shogi simulation game developed by Alpha Denshi and published by SNK. The player is an entrant of a tournament with a diverse cast of participants. The player can raise through the ranks by playing against each of them or spend some time familiarizing themselves with the rules and tactics of Shogi in the training mode.
